i1.name: More Sparkles!
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], '''Zoe's''' next [[basic attack]] or {{ai|Spell Thief|Zoe}} bubble within 5 seconds becomes {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}} and deals {{passive progression/deprecated version|16;20;24;28;32;36;42;48;54;60;66;74;82;90 to 130|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

w1.name: Spell Thief
description: {{sbc|Passive - Spell Thief:}} Whenever enemy champions cast a {{ccib|Summoner spell icon.png|summoner spell}} or {{ccib|Active ability item icon.png|Active ability items|item active}}, they drop the corresponding ''{{as|{{ccib|Spell Thief Minimap.png||Spell Shard}}|armor}}'' onto the ground that grants {{tip|sight}} over a 100-radius area and remains for 40 seconds. Some enemy {{tip|minions}} spawn with random ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' that only drop to the ground for 20 seconds if killed by '''Zoe'''.

Collecting a ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}'' allows '''Zoe''' to activate ''Spell Thief'' within the next 60 seconds. She can replace her current ''Spell Thief'' active by moving directly onto another ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' mimics the active of the collected ''{{as|Spell Shard|armor}}''.

{{sbc|Passive - Wheeeee:}} Casting ''Spell Thief'' or one of '''Zoe's''' own summoner spells grants her {{sti|ms|{{As|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the next few seconds, and summons three bubbles that orbit her for the next 10 seconds.

If '''Zoe''' is not affected by [[Crowd control#Loss of Control|total crowd control]] she hurls one bubble at a time at the nearest enemy in range, prioritizing her attack target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} with each bubble.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Orb|{{ap|25|35|45|55|65}} {{as|(+ {{fd|13.{{Recurring|3}}}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75|105|135|165|195}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Mimics the details of the mimicked active.
* Minions that can drop ''{{as|Spell Shards|armor}}'' are marked with a tied cosmic balloon that floats above them.
** Minions do not drop a shard for {{ii|Hextech Gunblade}} or {{si|Teleport}}.
* '''Zoe''' utilizes an attack-like animation whenever one of the bubbles hurls itself at an enemy, making it look as if she can attack while moving.
* '''Zoe''' cannot steal [[Consumable item|consumables]], [[trinket]]s, [[Item#Classification|component]] items, or items that create deployable or persistent effects. Some actives are excluded for balance purposes. The following list was last checked November 8th<ref>[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4u0eOkzQHs Spell Thief list]</ref>:
{{Zoe Spell Thief list}}

e1.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' kicks a ''bubble'' in the target direction that bursts on the first enemy hit, or else forming a trap at maximum range for 5 seconds that arms after {{fd|0.8}} seconds. The ''bubble'' can only move through terrain once but may do so indefinitely, can only move up to 650 units once outside terrain, and will fall short if it would enter terrain again.

The ''bubble'' deals {{as|magic damage}} on contact with an enemy and renders them {{tip|drowsy}} for {{fd|1.4}} seconds, which gradually {{tip|slow|slows}} them, after which they fall {{tip|sleep|asleep}} for {{fd|2.25}} seconds. '''Zoe''' will gain {{tip|obscured vision}} of the target while they're {{tip|sleep|asleep}} if they are not {{tip|sight|visible}}.

The next non-{{tip|persistent damage|persistent}} non-{{tip|minion}} damage taken by the {{tip|sleep|sleeping}} target consumes the debuff to deal {{sti|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} equal to the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} dealt, capped at ''Sleepy Trouble Bubble's'' damage. The '''bonus''' damage is dealt before the triggering damage.
e1.notes: * If exceptionally close to terrain, the ball will pass through without detection and will still be able to pass through a second piece of terrain - although it sacrifices any range its already used going through the first piece.

  • Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)
• Maximum Mixed Damage: (+ 80% AP)

r1.name: Portal Jump
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zoe''' dives into a portal that she opens beneath her, {{tip|blink|blinking}} a fixed distance in the target direction for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which she sets her {{as|movement speed}} to a {{as|static 0|ms}} and has {{tip|unobstructed vision}}. After 1 second, she blinks back to her cast location.
'''Zoe''' is unable to basic attack and cast her abilities and movement spells for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after casting ''Portal Jump'' and for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after blinking back.
r1.notes:
* '''Zoe''' will always blink back, regardless of the circumstances.
* '''Zoe''' can attack and cast abilities and movement spells at the target location for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after she is able to use them again.
* Upon reaching her destination, '''Zoe''' will either raspberry at the nearest enemy champion, or lick an ice cream cone when there are no enemy champions in {{tip|sight}}.
* '''Zoe''''s return position is shifted slightly in the target direction from her cast location.
